name: Ginseng
health_benefits: Boosts energy levels, enhances brain function, and reduces stress.
ayurvedic_importance: Used as an adaptogen to improve overall vitality and longevity.

name: Sandalwood(Chandan)
health_benefits: Reduces skin irritation, acts as an antiseptic, and promotes relaxation.
ayurvedic_importance: Used in Ayurveda for skin treatments and calming effects.

name: Rosemary
medicinal_uses: Hair Growth, Cognitive Function, Muscle Pain
health_benefits: Improves memory, stimulates hair growth, and relieves muscle pain.
ayurvedic_importance: Known for its ability to enhance brain function and circulation.

name: Lemon(Neembu)
health_benefits: Aids digestion, detoxifies the body, and brightens skin.
ayurvedic_importance: Used in Ayurveda for balancing digestion and cleansing the body.

name: Fennel Seeds(Saunf)
health_benefits: Eases digestion, reduces bloating, and prevents indigestion.
ayurvedic_importance: Commonly used for digestive health and cooling the body.

name: Curry Leaves(Kari Patta)
medicinal_uses: Hair Growth, Skin Health, Eye Health
health_benefits: Strengthens hair roots, improves vision, and nourishes the skin.
ayurvedic_importance: Traditionally used for hair and eye care in Ayurveda.

name: Mustard(sarso)
medicinal_uses: Pain Relief, Joint Health, Circulation Boost
health_benefits: Relieves joint pain, improves blood circulation, and reduces inflammation.
ayurvedic_importance: Used in Ayurveda for muscle relaxation and warming therapy.

name: Garlic(Lehsun)
health_benefits: Boosts immunity, lowers blood pressure, and detoxifies the body.
ayurvedic_importance: Considered a powerful natural antibiotic in Ayurveda.

name: Thyme(Ajwain ke Phool)
health_benefits: Clears congestion, soothes cough, and supports respiratory function.
ayurvedic_importance: Used for treating colds and infections naturally.

name: Sage(Safed Marua)
health_benefits: Enhances memory, reduces stress, and supports brain function.
ayurvedic_importance: Known as a brain booster and stress reliever in Ayurveda.

name: Tulsi
medicinal_uses: Treats cough, cold, and respiratory disorders.
health_benefits: Boosts immunity, reduces stress, and improves digestion.
ayurvedic_importance: Considered sacred in Ayurveda, used in many herbal formulations.

name: Neem
medicinal_uses: Used for skin infections, diabetes control, and detoxification.
health_benefits: Purifies blood, improves liver function, and has antibacterial properties.
ayurvedic_importance: Known as 'Sarva Roga Nivarini' meaning universal healer.

name: Aloe Vera
medicinal_uses: Helps in wound healing, skin hydration, and digestive aid.
health_benefits: Soothes burns, promotes hair growth, and regulates blood sugar.
ayurvedic_importance: Used in Ayurveda for skincare and gut health.

name: Arjuna
medicinal_uses: Heart Health, Blood Circulation, Cholesterol Control
health_benefits: Strengthens heart muscles, improves circulation, and reduces cholesterol.
ayurvedic_importance: One of the best herbs for heart health in Ayurveda.

name: Moringa
health_benefits: Rich in vitamins and minerals, boosts immunity, and fights inflammation.
ayurvedic_importance: Known as the 'Miracle Tree' in Ayurveda due to its high nutrient value.

name: Holy Basil
health_benefits: Fights infections, reduces stress, and improves lung function.
ayurvedic_importance: Considered sacred and used in many Ayurvedic formulations.

name: Tulsi
medicinal_uses: Treats cough, cold, and respiratory disorders.
health_benefits: Boosts immunity, reduces stress, and improves digestion.
ayurvedic_importance: Considered sacred in Ayurveda, used in many herbal formulations.

name: Neem
medicinal_uses: Used for skin infections, diabetes control, and detoxification.
health_benefits: Purifies blood, improves liver function, and has antibacterial properties.
ayurvedic_importance: Known as 'Sarva Roga Nivarini' meaning universal healer.

name: Ginger
health_benefits: Aids digestion, relieves nausea, and has strong anti-inflammatory properties.
ayurvedic_importance: Used in Ayurveda for treating colds, digestion issues, and inflammation.

name: Turmeric
health_benefits: Reduces inflammation, boosts antioxidants, and helps in wound healing.
ayurvedic_importance: Highly valued in Ayurveda for its healing, detoxifying, and anti-aging properties.

medicinal_uses: Helps in wound healing, skin hydration, and digestive aid.
